mapper.select:
SELECT order_id orderId, sum(price * a.num) orderSum, order_state orderState, a.shop_id shopId, user_name userName, d.phone phone, a.affirm_time affirmTime, a.version FROM ( t_order a LEFT JOIN t_commodity b ON a.c_id = b.c_id ) LEFT JOIN t_user d ON a.user_id = d.user_code WHERE 1=1
AND user_name LIKE concat ('%',#{userName},'%')
AND phone LIKE concat ('%',#{phone},'%')
AND order_id LIKE concat ('%',#{orderId},'%')
AND order_state LIKE concat ('%',#{orderState},'%')
AND affirm_time >= #{start}
AND affirm_time <= #{end}
GROUP BY a.user_id, a.order_id, a.order_state, a.shop_id, a.affirm_time, a.version
SELECT user_id userId, order_id orderId, a.c_id cId, c_name cName, a.num, order_sum, price, sell FROM t_order a LEFT JOIN t_commodity b ON a.c_id = b.c_id WHERE order_id=#{orderId}

update.foreach: update t_order set order_state = #{state}, version = version + 1 where order_id = #{item.orderId} and version = #{item.version}
